page.title: 19Shops in Ribchester
page.content: In Ribchester there are the following shops: Spar:sells Tins of food , drinks,toff- ees,biscuits,milk and bread etc. Paper shop: sells papers, toffees,foot- balls and toys. Greengrocers:sells vegetables , fruit frozen food and fresh fish. Post Office:sells stamps, cards, pens ,rubbers etc. Village Store:sells toffes,bread,tin food,wine & spirits. The Old Barn: sells flowers, garden pl- ants,potting compost and equipment. Hairdressers:hair cuts. Mill shop:sells material. The Gift Shop:sells toys,cooking things and, ornaments. Steves:sells fruit,toffees and tin foods. Butchers:sells meats, liver, chicken, lamb, bacon, eggs and cheese.
